publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3086 Aileen Campbell: Braidwood Primary Wins Gold Award for Promoting Health—That the Parliament congratulates Braidwood Primary School in South Lanarkshire on being awarded the prestigious Health Promoting Schools gold award after taking part in awareness raising and healthy living initiatives to achieve this and encourages schools across Scotland to follow Braidwood’s example and promote healthy living for all.

S3M-3086 Braidwood Primary Wins Gold Award for Promoting Health (lodged on 10 December 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Jackson Carlaw*, Christina McKelvie*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Robin Harper*

S3M-3086 Aileen Campbell: Braidwood Primary Wins Gold Award for Promoting Health—That the Parliament congratulates Braidwood Primary School in South Lanarkshire on being awarded the prestigious Health Promoting Schools gold award after taking part in awareness raising and healthy living initiatives to achieve this and encourages schools across Scotland to follow Braidwood’s example and promote healthy living for all. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Alasdair Allan, Jackson Carlaw, Christina McKelvie, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Gil Paterson*, Ian McKee*
S3M-3086 Braidwood Primary Wins Gold Award for Promoting Health (lodged on 10 December 2008) Karen Gillon*
S3M-3086 Braidwood Primary Wins Gold Award for Promoting Health (lodged on 10 December 2008) Stuart McMillan*
